name: Mandelbrot explorer
description:
Controls Action Controller Keyboard Mouse Move Up Left-stick up W
Move Down Left-stick down S
Move Left Left-stick left A
Move Right Left-stick right D
Zoom in Right-stick up I or Up Scroll up Zoom out Right-stick down K or Down Scroll down Increase Iterations Right shoulder E
Decrease Iterations Left shoulder Q
Toggle Julia preview A Space Middle Click Switch between Mandelbrot and Burning Ship B Left Shift
References Mandelbrot Set Julia Set Burning Ship fractal
